param.name: offset
param.label: Chromosomal position
param.option: Force zero-based positions (both input and output)
Force one-based positions (both input and output)

tool.help:
This tool calculate the effect of variants (SNPs/MNPs/Insertions) and deletions.
For details about this tool, please go to http://snpEff.sourceforge.net
